# YourHQ

> Done-for-you websites for tradies, salons, and consultants in New Zealand. Your business deserves to be seen. Properly.

YourHQ is a web design agency based in Whangārei, New Zealand, that builds professional websites in 5 days with zero homework required from clients. We handle everything — design, copywriting, hosting, maintenance, and an annual design refresh — so business owners can focus on what they do best.

## Pages

- [Home](https://yourhq.co.nz/): Overview of YourHQ's done-for-you website service, value propositions, testimonials, and calls to action.
- [Pricing](https://yourhq.co.nz/pricing): Three tiers — Starter ($695 setup + $49/mo), Launch ($995 setup + $149/mo), and Growth ($1,495 setup + $249/mo). Includes founding member offer.
- [How It Works](https://yourhq.co.nz/how-it-works): 5-step process from discovery interview to launch day.
- [Portfolio](https://yourhq.co.nz/portfolio): Showcase of completed client websites.
- [Blog](https://yourhq.co.nz/blog): 25+ articles on web design, SEO, business growth for trades, salons, and consultants.
- [Our Story](https://yourhq.co.nz/our-story): Company background and founders.
- [Tradies](https://yourhq.co.nz/tradies): Specialised landing page for electricians, plumbers, and builders.
- [Contact](https://yourhq.co.nz/contact): Get in touch with the YourHQ team.
- [Refer](https://yourhq.co.nz/refer): Referral programme details.
- [Discovery Interview](https://yourhq.co.nz/discovery-interview): Book a free consultation to kick off your website project.
- [NZ Website Design](https://yourhq.co.nz/nz-website-design): Local SEO page targeting New Zealand web design searches.
- [Privacy Policy](https://yourhq.co.nz/privacy): How we handle your data.
- [Legal Terms](https://yourhq.co.nz/legal): Terms and conditions.

## Key Information

### What We Do
We build fast, professional websites for small businesses across New Zealand. Our caretaker model means clients pay a small monthly fee and never worry about hosting, security, updates, or redesigns again.

### Who We Serve
- **Tradies**: Electricians, plumbers, builders, and other trades professionals
- **Salons & Creatives**: Hair salons, beauty studios, and creative businesses
- **Consultants & Professionals**: Business consultants, coaches, and service providers

### Pricing Model
- Setup fee (one-time) + monthly caretaker fee
- All plans include hosting, SSL, maintenance, and unlimited content updates
- Annual design refresh included at no extra cost
- "Love Your Launch Guarantee" — full refund if unhappy with preview

### What's Included
- Custom design (no templates)
- Copywriting from a drive-home voice interview
- Domain and hosting setup
- Google Maps listing setup
- Mobile-responsive design
- Ongoing maintenance and security
- SEO fundamentals

### Location
Based in Whangārei, servicing all of New Zealand.

## Tech Stack
- Built with Astro, React, and Tailwind CSS
- Static site generation for fast load times
- Image optimisation with Sharp
- ElevenLabs voice agent integration
